column4: I'm very confused,,, I've got a partition that says there are 26G in use, but there are only 18k in use by files(including hidden and trash).  Where could my 26G of files have disappeared to?
I know I had all of those files there
25 GB confirmed in use without option 's'
however, I do get "du: cannot access `/media/truecrypt1/home/default/.gconfd': Stale NFS file handle" but I don't think that's related
this is the third time i've mounted it with the same result
the last time i saw it working properly, I was trying to copy the data to a larger partition, and I had to cancel because the computer had to be shut downI was trying to copy the data from one volume
do you use a vfat partition?
ehhh. the file. i had a simliar error, but can't remember how to solve it
I can cd to it in the terminal.  I'll try finishing the move operation with terminal commands
